name: Cayman - Caravel Robusto
additionalNotes: Cayman cigars are handmade by Cuban masters and using the best tobacco in the Caribbean, they capture the essence of the Cayman Islands: innovation, quality and social commitment. Each cigar is a work of art, designed to delight your palate and satisfy your senses. By choosing Cayman, you not only enjoy an exceptional product, but also contribute to a brighter future for our communities. Discover the taste of tradition and innovation in each cigar.
